description: This file defines the LoginPage widget for a Flutter app, implementing a login screen with form validation, password visibility toggle, and navigation logic using custom routing.

classes.name: LoginPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen for email and password authentication.

classes.name: _LoginPageState
classes.description: State class managing the login form, input controllers, and login submission logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes the TextEditingControllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation, triggers login via AuthProvider, and updates navigation on success.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login page UI.
